EmailTemplate.name: HeadStart Application Parent Auto-email
EmailTemplate.subject: HeadStart - Thank you for applying!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
Thank you for applying to HeadStart
If you have selected a HeadStart volunteering opportunity we will be in touch shortly as there are limited spaces and the programme is on a first come first serve basis. If you have selected to find your own you are automatically part of HeadStart London.
Please click on this link to fill in our survey. It is important that this is completed before you attend Kick Off and start volunteering.
.
If you have any questions or concerns, then please don’t hesitate to contact the HeadStart by email at headstart@the-challenge.org.
The HeadStart London team
LIKE:Facebook: /Londonheadstart
EMAIL:headstart@the-challenge.org
TWEET:@HeadstartLondon
